channel.title: ENA4 - Kieli vaikuttamisen välineenä on PJMM - Englannin materiaalia
channel.description: Recent content in ENA4 - Kieli vaikuttamisen välineenä on PJMM - Englannin materiaalia

item.title: Apuverbit: Kirjoita 1
item.description: Täydennä verbimuodot annetun vihjeen mukaan. 1. I   (osasin) play the piano when I was little 2. My brother    (oli pystynyt löytämään) some money in the lake. 3.    (voisitko ojentaa) the salt, please? 4. You    (olisit voinut soittaa) before barging in here! 5. Yesterday I   (täytyi viedä) my dog with me to school. 6.    (kykenisitkö auttamaan) me with this umbrella?

item.title: Apuverbit: Kirjoita 2
item.description: Täydennä linkkisanat annetun vihjeen mukaan. 1. You   (ei tarvitse nauraa) at my jokes if you do not find them funny. 2. I    (en ole koskaan voinut valehdella) to my parents. 3. You    (ei tarvitse tehdä) all the exercises if you are going to ace them anyway. 4. You    (et saa valvoa) late studying even if your grades depended on it.

item.title: Demonstratiivipronominit: Kirjoita 1
item.description: Täydennä demonstratiivipronominit annetun vihjeen mukaan. 1.    (nykyään) it's impossible to find a partner. 2. The invention of internet made    (tällaisten asioiden) impossible for someone without digital knowledge. 3. Of course there are    (niitä joita) are interested in dating outside applications and such. 4. I'm curious to see what kind of person I will be meeting    (tällä kertaa), the last time was a disaster.

item.title: Indefiniittipronominit: kirjoita 1
item.description: Täydennä indefiniittipronominit annetun vihjeen mukaan. 1. Leaving for Las Vegas gets harder   (jokainen) every day. 2. Tell me    (kaikki) that happened you the previous time you were there. 3. I emptied    (molemmat) my bank accounts playing poker. 4.    (koko) Las Vegas was cheering for me to go on. 5. I haven't seen    (kumpaakaan) of my girlfriends after that night.

item.title: Indefiniittipronominit: kirjoita 2
item.description: Täydennä aukot indefiniittipronomineilla. In my opinion,   exercises on this website are great. This one in particular goes through    indefinite pronoun in one simple exercise. I don't even know    exercise that does that, on any site! I mean, naturally there are    exercises that go through many indefinite pronouns, but all    pronouns are left out completely! Actually, I think I am even in love with this exercise, as    my knees started shaking as I wrote the first pronoun.

item.title: Indefiniittipronominit: Lopputesti
item.description: function Quiz(questions) { this.score = 0; this.questions = questions; this.questionIndex = 0; } Quiz.prototype.getQuestionIndex = function() { return this.questions[this.questionIndex]; } Quiz.prototype.guess = function(answer) { if (this.getQuestionIndex().isCorrectAnswer(answer)) { this.score++; } else { displayFinalMessage();} this.questionIndex++; } Quiz.prototype.isEnded = function() { return this.questionIndex === this.questions.length; } function startOver() { location.reload(true); } function Question(text, choices, answer) { this.text = text; this.choices = choices; this.answer = answer; } Question.

item.title: Konnektiivit: Kirjoita 1
item.description: Täydennä linkkisanat annetun vihjeen mukaan. 1. Johnny does not play football   (vaikka) his brother plays in the Premier League. 2. Jonathan takes cycling lessons    (kun taas) his sister is into show dance. 3. Timothy started studying for his exams   (sen jälkeen kuin) he had taken his sister to school. 4. Jillian studies in the library   (aina kun) she can. 5.

item.title: Konnektiivit: Kirjoita 2
item.description: Täydennä linkkisanat annetun vihjeen mukaan. 1. I absolutely loved the movie.    (kaiken kaikkiaan), we had a lovely time. 2. Jonathan lost his ticket.    (sen seurauksena) he had to buy a new one. 3. The screening had been sold out.    (kuitenkin), we managed to get him a seat as someone decided not to show up. 4. Jonathan had left his credit card at home.

item.title: Relatiivipronominit: Lopputesti
item.description: function Quiz(questions) { this.score = 0; this.questions = questions; this.questionIndex = 0; } Quiz.prototype.getQuestionIndex = function() { return this.questions[this.questionIndex]; } Quiz.prototype.guess = function(answer) { if (this.getQuestionIndex().isCorrectAnswer(answer)) { this.score++; } else { displayFinalMessage();} this.questionIndex++; } Quiz.prototype.isEnded = function() { return this.questionIndex === this.questions.length; } function startOver() { location.reload(true); } function Question(text, choices, answer) { this.text = text; this.choices = choices; this.answer = answer; } Question.
